Package com.example.omrifit

Class TimerService

java.lang.Object
android.content.Context
android.content.ContextWrapper
android.app.Service
com.example.omrifit.TimerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2
public class TimerService extends android.app.Service
TimerService is a background service for managing a countdown timer. It provides actions to start, pause, continue, and cancel the timer.
